title: Love Obsessed
description:
What do you do when your brother does everything in his power to keep you away from the love of your life?

You do everything in your power to get her to be yours.
From the moment Brandon saw Erin in a local bar he was hooked. He had to protect her and make sure that she was treated right. Erin never expected to come across someone like Brandon. She had looked after herself since she was a young teenager and now she had someone who was hell bent on looking after her.Cole had fallen in love with Erin the first day Brandon brought Erin home to meet the family. He had to have her, but at what cost?When all emotions are revealed, conflicts are caused, choices have to be made and Erin has to decide what is best for her, a best friend who will do anything for her or the love of her life.
author: Veronica Short
